body_content.explanation: having the quality of continuing to make an effort to do or achieve something, even when this is difficult or takes a long time:
examples: He was one of the most determined, stubborn, persevering people I had ever met.
She was persevering enough to reach the height of her ambition and become CEO.
They have a persevering spirit through hardship.

body_content.explanation: continuing to exist despite a difficult or changing situation:
examples: Football has always been unpredictable and this is the reason for its persevering attraction.
It is a persevering and potentially increasing problem.
Martin Luther King, Jr. wrote of a necessary spirit of "persistent trying, perpetual experimentation, persevering togetherness".
